::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus slams one fist into his other open hand.

Jhiaxus: Damn! I had a Maximal femme bot cornered not too long ago. When her friends arrived to aid her I'm sure they called her Nightlight. She told me she knew nothing of Rodimus Prime other then him being around. Lieing slag!

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Perceptor:
 
 "I just know about the girl, her name is Nightlight, I guess that 
 she's a maximal, a very useless if you ask..."
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > 
 > A look of disgust came over Jhiaxus as he learned that Galvatron 
 existed here in some form but he quickly hid his feelings. Maybe he 
 could take his revenge for being betrayed and exiled by that lunatic 
 Galvatron.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: Perhaps I will. Once our time on past-Earth is done you 
 might consider joining the Decepticons.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus was lieing through his teeth. An outdated Decepticon would 
 be of no use to the G2's other then target practice.
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: Now, to this family business. Rodimus has a family these 
 days and on this planet no less. What are their names? Maximals or 
 Autobots?
 >
